english.segment1: I draw near to You. You draw near to me. You're calling me on. To a higher place
english.segment2: As children run. To their father's voice. Give me open ears. To hear You call
english.segment3: That I may live by Your word. To be all I'm called to be. I call on Your name. I need You my God. That I may live for Your word. Wholly devoted to You. I call on Your name. I need You my God
english.segment4: I draw near to You. You'll draw near to me. Let me hear You speak. To me Lord
